titles.title: Social Security Forever Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to impose a tax on the amount of wages in excess of the contribution and benefit base, and for other purposes.
Social Security Forever Act of 2009

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Social Security Forever Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to impose on employers, employees, and self-employed individuals an additional employment tax for wages in excess of the social security contribution and benefit base.
Requires all Treasury securities to bear a facsimile of the signatures of the President and the Secretary of the Treasury.
